meetings.description: Melissa works day in and day out on fine-tuning Toggl's features, so that your life would be as simple as possible. If you have any tips about making time tracking even smoother, catch her in Amsterdam and share your ideas.

Have you ever tried tracking your time with the Toggl Desktop application? Or maybe you're a fan of the Toggl Button? Indrek is the mastermind behind these tools and he's coming to Madrid to hear your thoughts on taking time tracking to the next level. Seize the opportunity and share your vision!

Have you heard about our amazing project management tool Teamweek? If you have, it's likely thanks to Laura. If not, youâ€™re really missing out. Either way, she's visiting Amsterdam to share Teamweek tips and tricks and get your feedback.
